name: Ghosts aren't real... Right?
description:
You go into a spooooky cave, but you suffer from anxiety. Luckily, you've got a loving and supportive boyfriend with you to help you out as you manage your anxiety in this short story about stressful situations and superstitions.

Features:

-A cute, around 30 minute adventure with your boyfriend in a cave

-A mlm/nblm romance with furries

-3 distinct endings based on your choices

-Zero ghosts, spirits, ghouls, nada... unless ;)

Credits:

Art, coding, music, mostly everything done by Poisonous Soybean.

Rumble sfx and cave ambience by Sound Effects Factory.

Made with Renpy.

Backgrounds copy-right free and modified with Gimp.

Special thanks to Jelly, Pizza and MinKazekage.
